known_issues: Utilities toggle turns on but does not stay enabled (state not persisting).

existing_features.title: Ensure the frontend utilities switches remain stable after toggling by relying on the backend-refetched `modules` state (React Query `modules` query) and do not visually revert unless the backend toggle fails.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the backend `toggleModule(moduleName : Text)` implementation so toggling a module actually updates the persistent `modules` state, and `getModuleStates()` reflects the updated values after a toggle.

projectName: Fix utility module toggles so they stay enabled (backend module state persistence)
